metadata.title: CVE-2014-9091 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Icecast before 2.4.0 does not change the supplementary group privilegeswhen <changeowner> is configured, which allows local users to gainprivileges via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9091` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

icecast2 - 2.4.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icecast2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.0-1').
